replies.body:
{{champion:254}} : Hey Morde, do you think you can get the other Morde to burn his ult?
{{champion:82}} : ... I mean, yeah, but I'd have to go all out and burn mine.
{{champion:254}} : ... Ya know what? I hate all of them. Do it. Get rid of both.
{{champion:82}} : ... *sniffle*

The other {{champion:82}} : MORDE, CAN I PLEASE ULT SOMETHING I CAN KILL THIS GA-
{{champion:254}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:37}} : **NO!!!!!!**
{{champion:82}} : Veigar, shutup.
{{champion:45}} : I... that's fair.

http://img.pandawhale.com/post-32457-Robot-huehuehue-hue-gif-iDiot-swUa.gif

Best thing is that the team really acts like that {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} .

>Nothing will happen.

Actually the one on the right wins in the gif.
Is the robot on the left dead? No, its nothing.
Can you really blame Malicious metal? He has too many damage items, while I go for a tankier build. Of couse I win with sunfire and thornmail.
Thornmail doesn't negate any of the Mace of Spades' magic damage, though.
Hmmm, in a mordekaiser fight I will just have to use Abyssal Scepter as last item.
Looks more like two Project: Yi skins fighting it out.
Well.... there are few machines that fight each other and survive.  These do, so it is fitting for Mordekaiser.
